articles.title: Mercury Ahead! Spacecraft Will Swoop by the Planet in Exciting Gravity Assist Maneuver - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The ESA/JAXA BepiColombo mission to Mercury will make the first of six flybys of its destination planet on October 1, 2021, before entering orbit in 2025. Hot on the heels of its last Venus flyby in August, the spacecraft’s next exciting encounter is with Mer…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Space Agency (ESA)October 1, 2021
